boardgame.name: Rise and Decline of the Third Reich
boardgame.description: Rise and Decline of the Third Reich is a realistic simulation of the grand strategic situation as it existed in Europe during WWII. It features 6 games in 1; a campaign game of 24 turns which runs from the invasion of Poland to Germany's final defeat or victory, an advanced game providing additional complexity, a multi-player version (in which even the Italian player can be the winner), and three 12-turn scenarios which allow you to play faster games. Third Reich is not for the faint of heart or the beginner simulation gamer. For 2 to 6 players. 560 counters which includes 1 blank one_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Rise and Decline of the Third Reich is a classic _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;grand strategy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; wargame covering the European theater of WWII. The game is huge in scope. Players take on the roles of all of the major national powers and can simulate the entire war effort from 1939 until the end (often isn't until 1946). This game is a favorite of many because of an excellent balance between politics and military might, and it gives players a chance to try things that did not happen historically to see if they might have worked better (e.g., Germany invading Spain). This game is definitely not for the novice gamer. The rules are intricate, and there are many factors for players to deal with: resources, unit production, negotiation, and, of course, strategic warfare._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Avalon Hill Complexity rating - 10_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is the final edition of this version - it has the 2-piece mapboard and the 4th edition rules. CONDITION: Excellent condition overall, contents unused (although the rulebook has been read) and complete, with UNPUNCHED counters. The box has light shelfwear. POSTAGE COST: UK postage: £5.50 European Postage: £10.00 Rest of World Postage: £20.00 Any buyers in and around London are welcome to collect in person (cash on collection). COMBINED SHIPPING: I will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible. Please note that it is NOT always cheaper to combine shipping on games outside the UK due to the weight limit of 2KG on the Small Packet service. As a rough approximation, outside the UK it is usually cheaper to combine 5 or more games, while 4 or less are best sent individually. This depends entirely on the specific games - please contact me before buying if you wish to purchase multiple games so that I can give you an accurate shipping cost. I am a verified PAYPAL Premier account holder (since 2004), with over 650 PayPal Verified Buyers. This is Third Reich with the 4th Edition Rulebook. The shrinkwrap has been removed. The game box is in very, very good to excellent condition. Inside, the components are all as new. The rulebook is clear white - no fading. It is clean and crisp - never been read. The counters are all unpunched. The game aid cards are as new. The mapboard is in beautiful condition (the colours are vibrant with no fading whatsoever). The whole set of components are in truly excellent condition. I pack very responsibly and make every effort to ensure the game reaches the buyer in the condition it leaves me. I buy a lot of games, so I appreciate the need for secure packing.

I am planning on donating this (along with Panzerblitz and Panzer Leader) within a couple of weeks - but thought I would check if a fellow Geek had interet. This is 3rd edition - never been punch. Boards do have some warping

Reserved for auction winner dungeonmattster I believe this is a 1st edition game of Third Reich. Map is older version, but still a mounted map board. Rule book has no edition printed on it, thus my belief it is first edition. Game is in well played condition. Map is in very good shape. Counters are punched and stored in envelopes provided by previous owner. Rule book has no major blemishes, but is used. French force pool card has small tear at top. Other force pool cards are in good condition. Box is worn. Three corners of lid are split and repaired by me with packaging tape. Box bottom is intact. This is an opportunity to own 1st edition of the granddaddy of WW2 grand strategic games.

Complete and unpunched. The shrink wrap was removed about twenty five years ago. So, there are some minor signs of aging, but otherwise the game is in very good condition. Contains the third edition map board and the fourth edition rules. Included with this order as part of the price is a second incomplete copy of the game, and the issue of the General featuring Third Reich on its cover. The second game contains the map board (good condition), play-aid cards, and all but 17 counters. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s not quite acceptable as a game by itself, but is a good source for spare parts. So, for the price of only $20 (plus shipping) you get a complete, unpunched copy of the game, an incomplete copy for spare parts, and the issue of the General featuring Third Reich.

Game is complete and would be in like new condition if the counters had not been detached. They are however neatly organized in the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s original tray. The game rulebook is in perfect condition. The box has a little shelf wear and a small (nearly invisible) dent on the top side. The game is otherwise in like new condition, showing NO WEAR at all. For all these years it has been stored in a closed cabinet in my home, under controlled conditions of humidity and temperature. Lastly, see the picture for your reference. I will ship worldwide at buyer’s expenses. Shipping to the US is 18 Euros, to Europe 13 Euros and within Italy 9 Euros. I will check shipping rates to other locations on demand and revert. Paypal or a bank draft preferred. Feel free to email me with questions! (IMPORTANT NOTICE: I am away from home on most weekdays, so allow a couple of days for a reply to your queries). Thanks for looking! Riccardo

Version - Box says Third Edition, Rules are Fourth Edition. Part of Avalon Hill_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s final direct sales clearance, where games were pieced back together from replacement parts and shipped unshrink wrapped. Condition - Unpunched and unplayed. Box is structurally strong, but has significant scuffing on all sides - it was actually shipped that way by Avalon Hill. Marks on sides where box evidently was taped shut and then the tape peeled off. Contents are in like new condition, rulebook appears free of yellowing. Payment by PayPal in advance or cash on pickup. For shipping this is considered a medium size game. The following options are available for delivery within the continental United States: 1) Local pickup in the San Jose, California area (no cost) 2) USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate - $6.60 (small), $12.65 (medium), or $17.15 (large), depending on game size. Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.
